member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_Nuint
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<nuint> derived type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface when defining const type arguments rather than K_Unmanaged<nuint>, K_Integer<nuint>, K_UnsignedNumber<nuint>, or IConstTypeArg<nuint>. In uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_Nuint.__
member.summary: The interface is a discard argument meant to signify a lack of value and is used as a placeholder in type parameter lists. When combined with other discard arguments of other types, it can be used to create union-like behavior.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_Nuint`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<nuint, K_Nuint<TSelf>> derived type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface for const type arguments in uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated. Otherwise, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_NuintArray
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<nuint[]> type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface when defining const type arguments rather than K_Array<nuint> or IConstTypeArg<nuint[]>. In uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_NuintArray.__
member.summary: The interface is a discard argument meant to signify a lack of value and is used as a placeholder in type parameter lists. When combined with other discard arguments of other types, it can be used to create union-like behavior.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.K_NuintArray`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<nuint[], K_NuintArray<TSelf>> derived type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface for const type arguments in uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated. Otherwise, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.Nuint`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the value from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the value to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be used to create domain-specific const type arguments or to wrap const type arguments for reuse in other contexts.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.NuintArray`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the array from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the array to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be used to create domain-specific const type arguments or to wrap const type arguments for reuse in other contexts.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.__
member.summary: The interface provides a const type argument that can be used as a value-less "discard" in type parameter lists to provide union-like behavior. Its value should not be used.
member.remarks: Types can implement this interface and other "discard" interfaces to satisfy constraints that can be used as value-less discard types in type parameter lists.

member.name: P:ConstTypeArgs.Nuints.__.Value
member.summary: A value equal to that should that is not meant to be used.
